 i'm with you man
  airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: Other who left RPG... If this problem continue soon won't be anyone 
here.

I thought that my reseach could help to solve this problem but I 
realised that I was doing an mistake: My mistake was that I thought 
that I was abble to do it alone but it isn't true, since the begin I 
was wrong and I need help.

Still I think that this RPG could come back to live but it need that 
all start to do something. Who wants help me??????

I won't let this RPG die... WHO'S WITH ME?
